description:
Access the CourseSmart website using a custom-designed HP WebOs application. This free app is a perfect complement to a CourseSmart subscription.            FEATURES & BENEFITS:  
1) Access your eTextbooks for quick reference, 2) Scan for images, tables, graphs & charts, 
3) Add and edit notes to pages as you study, 
4) Find what you need using keyword search, 
5) Get a true digital equivalent of your textbook.

     LEARN MORE AND SIGN UP FOR FREE  
Interested in the next level of anytime, anywhere access to web-based textbooks? Install the HP WebOS app and sign up online for free at www.coursesmart.com.  

     WHAT'S NEW  
Stack your reading notes, bookshelf, and textbook pages with the class handouts, related internet articles, and other activities to study smarter with CourseSmart’s eTextbooks for TouchPad.
versionNote: Reading experience now optimized for the Touchpad: 1) Table of contents includes integrated textbook search and easier navigation, 2) View and add sticky notes on a Textbook page, 3) List all notes in the textbook without leaving your current page, 4) Pinch to zoom now supported, 5) Tap left or right of the page to easily navigate to previous or next page
